name: iot-device-logger
description: A service to log data from IoT devices for a short duration.

resources.name: device-data
resources.description: Sensor and status data points logged from IoT devices.

fields.name: deviceId
fields.description: Unique identifier of the IoT device.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: ISO 8601 formatted timestamp of the log entry.

fields.name: sensorType
fields.description: Type of sensor or data point (e.g., 'temperature', 'humidity', 'status').

fields.name: value
fields.description: The measured value from the sensor or device.

fields.name: unit
fields.description: Unit of measurement for the value (e.g., 'C', '%', 'V').

fields.name: location
fields.description: Optional geographical location of the device.
